descrip: Tag Cloud: Generate tag clouds from lists of tags - PHP Classes

descrip: The basic idea this time is to present a way to form a tag cloud from user input text and text entered in the past. A tag cloud is a visual depiction of user-generated tags, or simply the word content of a site, used typically to describe the content of web sites.
title: Generating Tag cloud with PHP and MySQL. PHP Tag cloud generator
